main event: A round, bright blue object with a blueish trail was observed for approximately 10 minutes over a U.S. airbase in New York.
interesting points: The object was the size of a baseball and very bright in color.
The object exhibited a brilliant white flash that illuminated the cockpit of an aircraft.
The object descended in level flight at speeds ranging from 637 to 232 knots.
The sighting occurred on November 22, 1957 and was reported to Air Defense Command.
Weather conditions included clear skies and high winds at various altitudes.
sighted object: a round, bright blue object with a blueish trail
location: U.S. Airbase, Lynch, L.I., New York
